      • addEmployee

        public void addEmployee(java.lang.String name,
                        int ID,
                        int salary,
                        boolean status,
                        int experience,
                        int managedTeams,
                        int champions)
        Adds a new Main Coach to the club's employees
        pre: The club must be created
        post: Adds a new Main Coach to the club
        Parameters:
        name - The employee's name
        ID - the employee's ID
        salary - the employee's salary
        status - The employee's status
        experience - The coach's years
        managedTeams - The main coach's number of managed teams
        champions - The main coach's number of championships that his teams have won

        public void addEmployee(java.lang.String name,
                        int ID,
                        int salary,
                        boolean status,
                        int experience,
                        boolean wasPlayer,
                        int expertise)
        Adds a new Assistant Coach to the club's employees
        pre: The club must be created
        post: Adds a new Assistant Coach to the club
        Parameters:
        name - The employee's name
        ID - the employee's ID
        salary - the employee's salary
        status - The employee's status
        experience - It's the coach's years of experience
        wasPlayer - It's the value that says if the assistant was a player or nor
        experience - It's the number that indicates the expertise of the assistant
